error.message: Parameter $event of method Drupal\light_saml_idp\EventSubscriber\StoreAnonymousSAMLRequestSubscriber::storeSAMLRequest() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseForExceptionEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ExceptionEvent instead
Call to deprecated method getException() of class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseForExceptionEvent: since Symfony 4.4, use getThrowable instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8.0 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
